title: When I see the entire enemy team in one lane as Leona

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=ClockworkSheikah,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oVE2jnwL,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-04-14T20:16:21.369+0000)
>
> That's Pow-Pow lol

I know haha. It was just funny cause she was making a birth joke, and there was a pink blob inbetween her legs :P
Lol at one point is she aggressively telling the Jinx to build AP?

When I play Leona I always tank the tower for my ADC and use my Q as much as I can to get three quick hits in with the auto reset.

I guess I've been doing it wrong?
yeah, why the hell are you tanking, push the minions with your w and e.
Yep this is how sieges go a lot for me as Leona
Goddammit I finally got the punchline.
lmao.. that's how I behave when I'm on Leona
As the Jinx in the picture, I'm like "Yes ma'am!" @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
